alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 12 at 6:14PM MST until September 12 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 700 PM MST. * At 614 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Chui-Chu, or 11 miles southwest of Casa Grande, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Arizola and Stanfield. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 187 and 190. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 155 and 176. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 161 and 167. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
